name: Space Seclusion
description:
In a world were humanity has used up all it's resources and on the brink of extinction. A last hope has been sent into space to search for a new planet to inhabit. Six people have been chosen to go on the ship to search for a planet. You are one of the members that have been chosen for this trip. Your role on the ship is the main engineer.

While traveling in space and searching for a new planet, your ship gets attacked. The ship gets badly damage but it's still in tacked. In the confusion you realized that all of your crew members have been killed.

Thing calm down and you try to figure out what is going on. After a while you hear something from the engine room. When you view the security cameras you see that aliens have board the ship and are looking for survivors. With nothing to defend yourself, your only option is to reboot the security systems that have been damaged in the attack.

How long can you survive

Feature
-Flashlight (the aliens can see the flashlight)
-Endless Levels (levels only gets harder)
-Security Cameras
-Hide in lockers
